label: Install and configure Team Foundation Server (TFS) (25-30%)

skills.label: Install Team Foundation Server
items: Sql server version support, install team foundation server in a multi-tier or multi-machine environment, install team foundation server in a load-balanced environment, set up a version control proxy server, schedule automatic backup and restore activities by using the tfs administration console

skills.label: Configure the application tier
items: Validate an installation, configure smtp for team foundation server, change the url (friendly name), change the default sharepoint web app, set up reporting (sql server analysis services)

skills.label: Migrate and upgrade Team Foundation Server
items: Upgrade to team foundation server in place or move to new hardware, import a source base from a non–team foundation server system, upgrade a team project

skills.label: Install and configure Lab Management
items: Set up environment templates, install and configure test agents, install and configure system center virtual machine manager (basic virtual machine manager installation), create library shares or resource pools

skills.label: Install and configure multiple build agents and controllers
items: Tag and bind a controller to a project collection, add a build agent

skills.label: Manage team project collections
items: Move project collections, manage team collections and projects, create and configure team project collections, create a team project using sharepoint and sql server reporting services (ssrs), split and partition team project collections

skills.label: Configure for backup and recovery
items: Back up and recover team foundation server and related components, recover a failed application tier, recover a failed database tier, implement a disaster recovery plan

skills.label: Monitor server health and performance
items: Monitor the server for performance issues (monitor activity logging database and team foundation server server manager), monitor the job infrastructure for failed jobs (monitoring warehouse adapters and warehouse jobs), clean up stale workspaces and shelvesets, set up team foundation build to use a version control proxy server

skills.label: Operate lab management
items: Operate and modify lab environments, repair lab environments, use snapshots, store system center virtual machine manager environments

skills.label: Manage security
items: Configure limited users
Manage roles in team foundation server using active directory groups
Manage permissions in team foundation server in sharepoint, ssrs, builds, source control, and work item management
Create and manage teams
Configure security for users who do not have a client access license (cal)

skills.label: Manage reporting for Team Foundation Server
items: Manage basic reporting using excel services, customize the sharepoint team project portal, upload a new ssrs team foundation server report, configure team foundation server to enable a report to appear in a sharepoint project portal, rebuild the team foundation server data warehouse

label: Customize Team Foundation Server for team use (20-25%)

skills.label: Configure a team build definition
items: Set up for a symbol server and source server
Set up for custom build numbers, configure build log verbosity
Set up definition properties (test impact analysis, code analysis, automated unit testing, and architecture validation)
Set up build triggers (gated check-in, continuous integration, and scheduled build)
Configure the build drop location to be in source code control or a fileshare

skills.label: Manage build execution
items: Queue a build with parameters, reconcile workspaces as part of a gated check-in workflow, customize build qualities, clean up builds (apply retention policies)

skills.label: Modify a process template
items: Upload and download process templates
Troubleshoot template errors
Customize functional areas within process templates, including ssrs, sharepoint, build definitions, work items, and queries

skills.label: Configure a team project
items: Define areas and iterations, manage users through the default security groups, manage portal settings (team project portal site url, process guidance url), define project-level alerts

skills.label: Apply Work Item customizations
items: Add a new work item type as a child of an existing work item
Customize field definitions for a work item
Customize form layout and workflows
Customize global lists, link types, and categories

skills.label: Create Work Item queries
items: Define query folders and permissions
Apply query types (tree, flat, directed), add fields to a query, create a query by using team explorer

skills.label: Configure client connectivity to Team Foundation Server
items: Configure visual studio, team explorer, team explorer everywhere, excel, project, and other tools to connect to team foundation server
Configure clients for a proxy server

skills.label: Create and manage workspaces
items: Cloak, undo delete, and modify a workspace
Delete a workspace
Specify workspace visibility
Unlock other users’ checkouts, pending changes, and code
Choose a default workspace type for a collection
Delete a shelveset

skills.label: Configure version control proxy
items: Set up the cache hit ratio, set up the cache size, set up for multiple team foundation server servers

skills.label: Configure team project version control settings
items: Enable multiple checkout, enable get latest on checkout, configure check-in policies for a team project (work items, builds, code analysis, testing policies)
